channel.title: Runner not working after coded something
channel.description:
Ok i was coding (adding npcs) in the npclist and when i got done coding, compiled, and click run when i click run it goes up and down.... this is a picture:
[IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/2a5hxlh.png[/img]
http://tinypic.com/r/2a5hxlh/6
says: Starting server on port: 43594 Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayindexoutofBoundsException: 10 at net.com.espeon.npcs.loading.LoadNpcList.loadnpclist<init><loadnpclist.java:103> at net.com.espeon.npcs.leading.loadnpclist.loadnpclist<init><loadnpclist.java:22>
at net.com.espeon.engine.<init><engine.java:117> at net.com.espeon.server.main<server.java:70> The system cannot find the batch label specified - main
And when i saw that it was weird because i didn't go into the loadnpclist... and now i cant log onto my server this was after i coded into the npclist.. Now if you would like picures of the loadnpclist here they are..
[IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/2zjdsf5.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/msbu9v.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/2rf3nms.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/inu5bs.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/a4y1om.png[/img]
Can you all please help me... because i sure cant do it...
Thanks

item.title: Runner not working after coded something
item.dc:creator: @lugmfr lugmfr
item.description:
@lugmfr wrote:

I was right :o ahah

Read full topic
item.source: Runner not working after coded something

item.title: Runner not working after coded something
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“lugmfr, post:11, topic:343054”]I had this error when i used the space bar instead of the tab button when adding npcs. idk why may not be it but its worth a try[/quote]Yea, that’s the problem.

You see, the NPCSpawn loader uses a ‘split character’ to separate each spawn into parts. In this case, the split character is \t, which means tab. If you use anything else it will mess up.

Read full topic

item.title: Runner not working after coded something
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

Rather than taking a picture of the code:
IDEA - COPY AND PASTE IT IN CODE TAGS.

But your problem is that you have an improperly form mated npcspawn.cfg

When you were adding a spawn you forgot to add one of the arguments.
